banner.title: (FR) Not sure where to begin? Take the quiz!
banner.text: (FR) Take our quiz and receive a personalized checklist to help guide you through retirement.

landing.title: (FR) Retirement Ready Quiz
landing.p1: (FR) Not sure you've checked all the boxes to retire? Take this quiz as a first step towards your retirement checklist.
landing.p2: (FR) Your answers will help identify government pensions and benefits you could receive. They will also guide you on what to consider to better prepare for retirement.
landing.p3: (FR) You don't need any special information to take this quiz. To create the most appropriate retirement checklist, you will need to provide information on the following:
landing.legalextra: (FR) (such as Canadian citizen, Indian Status, or permanent resident)
landing.retirementextra: (FR) (when you plan on retiring, where you plan on living in retirement, etc.)

sections.title: (FR) Managing your money in retirement
sections.body: (FR) Prepare for a comfortable retirement by exploring our money management section, which includes guidance on personal savings, identifying potential income sources, tax implications, and more - all with CPP and OAS benefits in mind.

cards.title: (FR) Overview of retirement income sources
cards.body: (FR) Learn about public & private pensions, personal savings and investments.

cards.title: (FR) Planning to save for retirement
cards.body: (FR) Learn how to maximize your savings and to better manage your money in retirement.

sections.title: (FR) Making retirement decisions
sections.body: (FR) Gain clarity and confidence when making retirement decisions with our comprehensive section on CPP and OAS pension timing and transitioning from work, designed to support and empower you on your retirement journey.
